column5: A classic South Austin Bungalow located off Oltorf in the Dawson Neighborhood between South Congress and South 1st. Equal walking distance to both SOCO, South 1st and numerous hot spots including the 4 of the very best live music venues in Austin, south congress shopping, and over 20 coffee shops!   No frills cottage in a very convenient location.
column8: Austin, South SOCO Cottage - Walk to S Congress
